Pre-Game Insights: The coach got us all together on Thursday and talked to us, and I had the feeling we were entering another dimension.
He told us we had to concentrate on the future, that the past was over.
There is no doubt that there is a solid defensive base, but it is also evident that there is a serious lack of attacking inspiration.
Belgium finished second in its group (behind Romania), with a mixed record (one win, one draw and one defeat), and its goal tally was no greater than that of the French (two goals scored).
Belgium is dreaming of erasing the traumatic defeat at the 2018 World Cup, considered to be an injustice.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the toughest match of the round of 16 at Euro 2024.
Belgium will also no doubt be telling themselves that a new competition has begun.
Thomas Meunier, Jan Vertonghen and Axel Witsel are part of the old guard of the Belgian golden generation.
